name: Stage Fright (itch) (Classy Bogan Studios)
description:
Music-Based Looping Wave-Defense Game

Get your punk on, using the power of music to fend off against hordes of crazed fans, as you switch between the four band members, using their own style of play and musical instrument to fight against your undead fans before they can take you away.

Micromanage your band as waves of fans try and swarm you on stage. Attack with timing and positioning your band member with your song loop. The longer you play the more fans but the more complex your song becomes.

Instructions:

Step One: Choose your band member (Q/E key)

Step Two: Line up your zombie-fan threat (Left click and mouse move to rotate)

Step Three: Let the rhythm take care of the rest!
